name: JBETHPaymentTerminal
description: A project can transfer its funds, along with the power to reconfigure and mint/burn their tokens, from this contract to another allowed terminal contract at any time. Inherits from: IJBPaymentTerminal - general interface for the methods in this contract that send and receive funds according to the Juicebox protocol's rules. JBOperatable - several functions in this contract can only be accessed by a project owner, or an address that has been preconfifigured to be an operator of the project. ReentrencyGuard - several function in this contract shouldn't be accessible recursively.

functionDecorators.name: addToBalanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Receives funds belonging to the specified project.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to which the funds received belong.

parameterDecorators.name: _memo
parameterDecorators.description: A memo to pass along to the emitted event.

functionDecorators.name: delegate
functionDecorators.description: An address that serves as this terminal's delegate when making requests to ecosystem contracts.

functionDecorators.name: directory
functionDecorators.description: The directory of terminals and controllers for projects.

functionDecorators.name: distributePayoutsOf
functionDecorators.description: Distributes payouts for a project according to the constraints of its current funding cycle. Payouts are sent to the preprogrammed splits.Anyone can distribute payouts on a project's behalf.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project having its payouts distributed.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount being distributed.

parameterDecorators.name: _currency
parameterDecorators.description: The expected currency of the amount being distributed. Must match the project's current funding cycle's currency.

parameterDecorators.name: _minReturnedWei
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum number of wei that the amount should be valued at.

functionDecorators.name: ethBalanceOf
functionDecorators.description: The ETH balance that this terminal holds for each project.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to which the balance belongs.

functionDecorators.name: fee
functionDecorators.description: The platform fee percent.

functionDecorators.name: feeGauge
functionDecorators.description: The data source that returns a discount to apply to a project's fee.

functionDecorators.name: heldFeesOf
functionDecorators.description: The fees that are currently being held to be processed later for each project.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project for which fees are being held.

returnDecorators.description: An array of fees that are being held.

functionDecorators.name: migrate
functionDecorators.description: Allows a project owner to migrate its funds and operations to a new terminal. Only a project's owner or a designated operator can migrate it.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project being migrated.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The terminal contract that will gain the project's funds.

functionDecorators.name: operatorStore
functionDecorators.description: A contract storing operator assignments.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: pay
functionDecorators.description: Contribute ETH to a project. The msg.value is the amount of the contribution in wei.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project being paid.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address to mint tokens for and pass along to the funding cycle's data source and delegate.

parameterDecorators.name: _minReturnedTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum number of tokens expected in return.

parameterDecorators.name: _preferClaimedTokens
parameterDecorators.description: A flag indicating whether the request prefers to issue tokens unstaked rather than staked.

parameterDecorators.name: _memo
parameterDecorators.description: A memo to pass along to the emitted event, and passed along the the funding cycle's data source and delegate.

parameterDecorators.name: _delegateMetadata
parameterDecorators.description: Bytes to send along to the delegate, if one is provided.

functionDecorators.name: processFees
functionDecorators.description: Process any fees that are being held for the project. Only a project owner, an operator, or the contract's owner can process held fees.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project whos held fees should be processed.

functionDecorators.name: projects
functionDecorators.description: The Projects contract which mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.

functionDecorators.name: redeemTokensOf
functionDecorators.description: Addresses can redeem their tokens to claim the project's overflowed ETH, or to trigger rules determined by the project's current funding cycle's data source. Only a token's holder or a designated operator can redeem it.

parameterDecorators.name: _holder
parameterDecorators.description: The account to redeem tokens for.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to which the tokens being redeemed belong.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenCount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of tokens to redeem.

parameterDecorators.name: _minReturnedWei
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum amount of Wei expected in return.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address to send the ETH to. Send the address this contract to burn the count.

parameterDecorators.name: _memo
parameterDecorators.description: A memo to pass along to the emitted event.

parameterDecorators.name: _delegateMetadata
parameterDecorators.description: Bytes to send along to the delegate, if one is provided.

returnDecorators.name: reclaimAmount
returnDecorators.description: The amount of ETH that the tokens were redeemed for, in wei.

functionDecorators.name: remainingDistributionLimitOf
functionDecorators.description: The amount of funds that can still be distributed within the preconfigured limit.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to which the remaining limit belongs.

parameterDecorators.name: _fundingCycleConfiguration
parameterDecorators.description: The funding cycle configuration during which the limit remaining is being calculated.

parameterDecorators.name: _fundingCycleNumber
parameterDecorators.description: The number of the funding cycle during which the limit remaining is being calculated.

returnDecorators.description: The remaining distribution limit for this terminal.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setFee
functionDecorators.description: Allows the fee to be updated for subsequent funding cycle configurations. Only the owner of this contract can change the fee.

parameterDecorators.name: _fee
parameterDecorators.description: The new fee.

functionDecorators.name: setFeeGauge
functionDecorators.description: Allows the fee gauge to be updated. Only the owner of this contract can change the fee gauge.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeGauge
parameterDecorators.description: The new fee gauge.

functionDecorators.name: splitsStore
functionDecorators.description: The contract that stores splits for each project.

functionDecorators.name: store
functionDecorators.description: The contract that stores and manages the terminal's data.

functionDecorators.name: token
functionDecorators.description: The token that this terminal accepts.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: useAllowanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Allows a project to send funds from its overflow up to the preconfigured allowance. Only a project's owner or a designated operator can migrate it.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to use the allowance of.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the allowance to use.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address to send the funds to.
